title: Server Issues?
body: The client froze in champ select, then kicked us all out, and now we can't log back in. We are all stuck on "authenticating". There is nothing posted yet so just wanted to know what was going on?

replies.body: Did this only happen once or are you still encountering issues when attempting to log in?
Having the same problem, also stuck on authenticating. I tried launching the legacy client but just got the logo and nothing happens.
For me game just frozed in the middle of the game. I did shut down and on the game but couldn't log on. WTH riot....

i was just searching for a game and it kicked me off and now im also getting error messages when i try to log in. so im thinking it is a server issue. i just hopped on to see if any one else was haveing the same problem
